subject: Ant build.xml minor bug
msgSnippet: Still haven t diagnosed my Eclipse problem so for the moment I feel back to Ant and noticed this. build.xml contains this line:
messageBody:
Still haven't diagnosed my Eclipse problem so for the moment I feel back
to Ant and noticed this. build.xml contains this line:

<property name="build.compiler" value="classic" />

When building with Java 1.5 this causes this warning:

[javac] This version of java does not support the classic compiler;
upgrading to modern

Since JUnit 4 can only be built with Java 1.5, I suggest removing the
above property element.

--
